chart.title: Coverage of treatment interventions for substance use disorders
chart.subtitle: The share of [substance use disorder](#dod:substance_use_disorder) patients who received treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial, and rehabilitation and aftercare services).
chart.citation: World Health Organization and United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime
